text: Avaru (salih) helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nivu (cintisi) nodidira, ondu vele nanu nanna odeyana kadeyinda (toralada) spastavada sari dariyalliddu, avanu tanna kadeyinda nanage visesa anugrahavannu dayapalisiruvaga, nanu avana ajneyannu mirinadedare, allahaninda yaru tane nannannu raksisaballaru? Nivantu nanna palige kevala nastavannu matra heccisuttiruviri
